metadata.title: CVE-2018-5748 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
qemu/qemu_monitor.c in libvirt allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice (memory consumption) via a large QEMU reply.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5748` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvirt-bin - 1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.26
libvirt0 - 1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.26
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvirt package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.26').
